channel.title: Football on Paul Burgoine
channel.description: Recent content in Football on Paul Burgoine

item.title: Web scraping fantasy premier league data using R
item.description: For my first project for this blog I decided to combine two of my loves, football and R. Having won my fantasy league this year with a respectable points haul of 2176, finishing in position 36,967 within England, and 94,774 globally I was interested to see which players were scoring me the most points. more text
